caption.p: Finite element (FE) simulations of the cold-rolling process for the 0.10C-1.50Cr steel. Cross-sectional views show the distributions of equivalent stress ( a1– a4) and strain ( b1– b4) during cold rolling: ( a1, b1) the first pass, ( a2, b2) the second pass, ( a3, b3) the third pass, and ( a4, b4) the fourth pass.
